fields.name: Punk IPA
fields.description: Punk IPA is the beer that kick-started it. This light, golden classic has been subverted with new world hops to create an explosion of flavour. Bursts of caramel and tropical fruit with an all-out riot of grapefruit, pineapple and lychee, precede a spiky bitter finish.

fields.name: Lost Lager
fields.description: This planet first German-style Pilsner is a 4.5% lager brewed using wind power and a third less water. The addition of Spalter Select and Saphir hops combine vibrant citrus and herbal notes for an iconic lager taste that's both crisp and refreshing.

fields.name: Hazy Jane
fields.description: New England detuned. This full-tilt fruit machine of an IPA packs all the flavour but less of the alcohol. Notes of pineapple, mango, stone-fruit, and a hint of tangerine to mix it up. Brewed with oats and wheat and left unfiltered for a smooth juicy hit.

fields.name: Black Heart
fields.description: Forget everything you know about stout. Forget what you think it tastes like. And forget having to go to Dublin to get a good pint of it. There’s a new stout in town, and it’s demanding your attention. Chocolate and extra dark crystal malts give layers of roasted, toasted coffee and cocoa, with a hint of caramel coming through. Classic stout, brewed in and for this century. Old dog, new tricks.

fields.name: Rattle and Rum
fields.description: Rattle & Rum is our latest foray into the stout style; a limited edition rum and oak chip beer that weighs in at 7.4% abv. Built on a foundation of 5 specialty malts and featuring just one hop variety, it’s rich, boozy, and brings a little Caribbean flair to our craft.

fields.name: Weekend Hooker
fields.description: Get hooked on our new craft lager! Reinvented with a bold variety of malts & left to condition until the optimum moment to ensure a smooth head with a soft, refreshing finish. Earthy in aroma, expect a full bodied malt character, with citrusy undertones and an assured bitter finish.

fields.name: Wired To The Toon
fields.description: Caramel Macchiato Impy Stout 10.2% A Russian Imperial Stout, soaked in rich caramel, vanilla & coffee flavours. A blend of malt consisting of Carafa, Crystal & Munich, creates a smooth complex body with notes of dark chocolate & toffee. Double infused with UK roasted Bennachie Coffee and left to condition on vanilla & caramel creme, bringing deep macchiato aromas and flavours to this strong, dark brew.

fields.name: Trawlerman
fields.description: Harsh weather, high sea and hardworking folk, Peterhead has them all. Life at sea builds up a thirst like no other, so - once back on dry land, reaching for this crushable hazy champion is the best welcome home any Trawlerman could have. Double dry-hopped with Galaxy & Azacca for a full on citrus and tropical flavour.

fields.name: M'ango Unchained
fields.description: Crafted with all the hop goodness of an IPA and infused with mouth-watering mango & passion fruits. Tropical on the nose & naturally hazy in colour, we have unchained masses of mango & hops into this one and created a beer that is sharp, edgy and bursting with flavour. “A fortuitous turn of events brought M’ango and ourselves together

fields.name: Sour To The People
fields.description: We gathered as much local rhubarb and strawberries that we could get our hands on to create this blade of a beer, sharp and fruity with a wicked bite. Loaded with fresh rhubarb and kettle soured to amplify the tartness, we have balanced the all round flavour profile by conditioning with fresh, juicy strawberries.

fields.name: Fierce Cerveza
fields.description: A crisp, light and refreshing Mexican style lager cut with fresh zesty lime juice and a pinch of sea salt to deliver maximum flavour.

fields.name: Fierce IPA
fields.description: A crisp and refreshing IPA that is full of citrus hop flavours. Thirst quenching, light bitterness.

fields.name: Forest Ranger
fields.description: This West Coast IPA has been hopped with Cascade, Simcoe and Amarillo for that classic pungent profile, alongside a touch of Centennial and Citra to layer on the pine and citrus flavours.

fields.name: Cookie Dough
fields.description: Brewed with our friends at Tartarus, this imperial strength stout is crammed with rich malt, cacao, spices and toasty oats. Sweet, indulgent and ready to roll.

fields.name: Black Grape Punch
fields.description: This juicy grape soda-inspired beer packs a punch. Bright, tart, and crammed with fruity flavour, it's the latest in our limited edition summery sours.

fields.name: Omnium
fields.description: Omnium is a full-flavoured Session IPA with bold citrus and tropical fruit notes. Generous doses of Citra, Amarillo, Mosaic & Simcoe hops makes Omnium an all round crowd pleaser!

fields.name: Barrel Aged Moon
fields.description: Rich sweet Bourbon goodness, big sherry notes and a rewarding finish. Aged in Fattercairn whisky casks.

fields.name: Peleton
fields.description: Peloton is a classic Pilsner, brewed to style; crisp with a noble bitterness. Peloton is produced using Scottish Pilsner malt, German hops and time. A refreshing and super accessible beer.

fields.name: Summer Bliss
fields.description: Rhubarb and raspberries were aged in barrel to produce a complex sour beer with a refreshing kick of fruit.

fields.name: Velodrome
fields.description: Bursting with aromas of papaya and soft apricot with a palate balanced with citrus, all wrapped up in a bed of haze.
